title: The Ghosts of Ragged-Ass Gulch
description: Nameless Detective Mystery Series --Ravaged by time and abandoned by the people who once flocked there in search of golden nuggets, Ragged-Ass Gulch is a ghost town. What's left is a small, proud, and close pack of people who aren't looking for change. But change seems to be afoot as several mysterious fires plague the town. That's where the Nameless Detective comes in...
author: Bill Pronzini
